content:
Wayne Mery said
Version 125.0 is not a production release, and you can expect add-ons to not work.

I am currently running this pc on Windows 10 and someone mentioned that it works on Windows 11 but that is not an option at this time. All I know is that the update came down sometime earlier this week. I became concerned when the OWL add-in I was using to pull in Office365 emails stopped working and I noticed it was disabled. I now see that Thunderbird ( v125) works without the OWL add-in once I reconfigured those Office365 accounts and I was able to access & use those accounts again.

The sort feature would make things a bit easier but its not a end of the world situation. Maybe the next release will allow my sort add-in to work.

content:
Hello there


Regarding the freezing of your Thunderbird software, it may freeze at startup and your system including Thunderbird becomes very slow, but it could also be your software.

If you have Windows, do you try to boot into a safe mode that is located there, and do you also try to boot into troubleshoot mode for Thunderbird, the question is whether it now responds normally in these two modes?

if not then it may be a bug in the program.

If so, it may have been due to another software program that starts up immediately, for example, when your system starts up.


Greetings Firefox volunteer
creator: Googlethunderbird

content:
Hello there

Thunderbird does not download to your inbox? You can see your emails but there is no content?

Thunderbird checks your inbox approximately every ten minutes. If you can access your server settings, you can adjust them there so that you do not have to check again that you need to download and/or perform the same actions to send data to your email inbox again. If this does not apply, it may not be necessary.

Make it clear that your email receipts can be properly received on the account you selected.

Enough space in your storage device and space in your inbox and keep an eye on large numbers of MBs and Gigs per shipment.

https://www.thunderbird.net/en-US/thunderbird/115.0.1/releasenotes/

Greetings Firefox volunteer
creator: Googlethunderbird

content:
Hello there

you can look for a solution with your Antivirus program or reset an index. See if you can adjust AV settings so that you no longer have problems if it could be related to your AV settings.

disabling parts of the security software and also disabling the software parts found herein or reducing the security level, you can temporarily disable the entire program, this could be a solution.

Can you continue or not be offered a solution, even if parts such as a register or part are deleted during a reset?

Then you can also delete the entire program and try to reinstall it or transfer certain data to a newer version of Thunderbird. And also use backup.


Greetings Firefox volunteer
creator: Googlethunderbird

To download your IMAP folders, you can switch to IMAP use if necessary.

How to force the download of imap.

tools) account settings) synchronisations and storage category voor imap) enable keep messages on this computer option go to the advance button to force thunderbird to download the imap messages.

content:
You appear to be using the Conversations add-on. Does the same thing happen in safe/troubleshoot mode (hold Shift when launching TB)? Safe mode will run without add-ons, among other factors.

It could also be an AV issue if your antivirus scans attachments (especially if it's non-MS AV).
